title: Birthday Dad
description: A dad who died on his birthday visits different people on their birthdays to help them work through their own issues.
quote: Maybe Iâ€™m just a crazy old birthday person, but I think war is bad.
altHero: Mr. Peanutbutter (a golden retriever) wears a scarf and stands atop empty bleachers
alt2: Birthday Dad looks upset as he speaks to a human woman
alt3: Birthday Dad holds the woman as she dies from a car accident
alt4: Birthday Dad yells in despair as dead soldiers lay on the ground nearby
